meta.title: Mark Gor | Portfolio
meta.description: Mark Gor's frontend developer career path, milestones and CV download.

hero.title: I'm a Frontend Developer
hero.subtitle: Building modern web applications with React and Laravel

about.heading: About Me
about.description: Welcome! As a frontend developer, I'm passionate about creating modern and user-friendly websites. I believe that a website should not only look beautiful but also effectively serve business goals. I offer personalized solutions where your needs and your business's unique character are at the center. Whether it's creating a new website or improving an existing one, my goal is to create a digital presence that not only attracts but also retains your customers. With years of experience and continuous learning, I ensure that your project is built using the latest technologies and best practices.

career_about.heading: Professional Introduction
career_about.description: As a frontend developer, I specialize in modern web technologies and user experience. I have several years of hands-on experience in developing complex web applications, where clean code and efficient solutions are as crucial as teamwork and agile methodologies. I've specialized in React.js and modern JavaScript (ES6+) technologies, as well as responsive and performance-oriented development. I continuously educate myself to stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices. My structured thinking and problem-solving skills help me effectively handle complex development challenges.

hero.title: Support your team with a professional frontend developer
hero.subtitle: Independent professional development, transparent processes, and result-oriented approach.

2019.title: HTML & CSS Basics
2019.desc: First project: creating a static portfolio page.

2020.title: JavaScript and SPA
2020.desc: ToDo App development with ES6+ and modular structure.

2021.title: React Portfolio
2021.desc: Creating a React-based portfolio site with Tailwind CSS.

2022.title: Freelance Projects
2022.desc: Working on websites for small and medium businesses.

2023-2024.title: Continuous Growth
2023-2024.desc: Courses, real client projects, new technologies.

scrimba.title: Scrimba – The Frontend Developer Career Path
scrimba.desc: During the Frontend Developer Career Path course, I mastered modern web technologies including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), React.js, and Git version control. The course developed my problem-solving skills and clean code writing ability through practical projects.

contact.heading: Let's Connect
contact.intro:
Have an idea or want to start a website?
Write to me or call me - I'd be happy to discuss it with you in person!
contact.phoneNote: Available on weekdays between 9:00 AM and 6:00 PM.

fullSite.title: Complete Website Development
fullSite.desc: Custom website design and development from scratch, according to your needs.

frontendDev.title: Frontend Development
frontendDev.desc: Building modern, responsive user interfaces with React and Laravel technologies.

responsive.title: Mobile-Friendly Design
responsive.desc: Developing responsive websites that work perfectly on all devices.

structuredCode.title: Structured Code
structuredCode.desc: Creating clean, well-documented, and easily maintainable codebase.

animations.title: Animations and Interactions
animations.desc: Impressive animations and interactive elements for better user experience.

support.title: Technical Support
support.desc: Continuous technical support and maintenance even after project completion.

step1.title: Initial Contact
step1.desc: We discuss your ideas and goals via email or phone.

step2.title: Quote and Requirements
step2.desc: I learn about your project details, then prepare an accurate quote and timeline.
